: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus can't believe what he has seen. His legs nearly give out, before he rushes to Nightlight's side.
The light had been a scanning beam for an alternate mode. The pain that Nightlight had felt was a child Transformer within her. The night... of passion... that they had spent together had inpregnented her, and now she had given birth... to their child!
Rodimus wanted to get Nightlight and the unnamed child to safety.
Rodimus Prime: I need you both to get inside my car mode so we can go home.
Rodimus transformes to car mode, opening his canope.
 Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:Nightlight:

Nightlight tried to transform once more, but before that somethinag amazing 
happened: Someway her bodya had created life and the little life that she 
was carried, born. A high light surrender the place and pass trought a 
sabletoot tiger's skull, that was almost buried near Nightlight.

The shine faded and a little and defenless cub was near Nightlight, second 
later a blind Sabletoot tiger's cub was crawling and yipping towards 
Nightlight, who was very tired to tried to transforma again.

>: : Rodimus Prime : :
>Rodimus Prime: Ok, honey, just hold on.
>He sits her on the ground, hopeing she can transform this time.
>  "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> 
>wrote:Nightlight:
>
>She did a supremme effort but she couldn't "I can't...Pleas leave in
>the ground... Just for few seconds... Perhaps this time I can..."
>

>wrote:
> >
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Rodimus rolled to the side as Perceptor's shots struck the cliff
>edge. Roddy reached over, letting off another two shots at the enemy.
> > Then Rodimus hears Kaiser.
> > Rodimus Prime: We came for the pod, but I dont enjoy getting in
>the middle of other people's fights. I'll let you all settle it your
>selves.
> > Roddy looks back at Nightlight.
> > Rodimus Prime: And I have more pressing concerns.
> > He gets up and goes to Nightlight, picking her up.
> > Rodimus Prime: I need you to transform, love, so I can drive you
>home.
> >  Rudra656@a... wrote:::Kaiser::
> >       Grateful for the reprieve he takes in the situation.  He
>watches Rodimus's worried look as Nightlight takes cover.  He
>launches another ten shots at Perceptor while still on the run.  He
>stops near Rodimus Prime.  "I'm thankful for your aid, Maximal but
>your comrade is in greater danger than I.  And when I defeat these
>Predacon scum I'm afraid you will be next if you choose to stay."

<P align=center>The light had been a scanning beam for an alternate mode. The pain that Nightlight had felt was a child Transformer within her. The night... of passion... that they had spent together had inpregnented her, and now she had given birth... to their child!
<P align=center>Rodimus wanted to get Nightlight and the unnamed child to safety.
<P align=center><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>I need you both to get inside my car mode so we can go home.
<P align=center>Rodimus transformes to car mode, opening his canope.
